trends: There have been no other sightings in Tuxedo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I stood on my front stoop to look at the neaby Lake, I saw a triangle of orange lights ascending slowly from the Northeast. As it gained altitude, it seemed to waver back and forth, rather than climbing in a straight line like a passenger or freight airplane. It flew towards me and over my head, and as it did so, I saw the three lights pulsing on and off, similarly to the way a mac computer light pulses. As it came over the top of me I could see it more closely, as it was only about 500 feet above me. It was the shape of a large cross. It was similar to an old style celtic cross, with the cross bar directly in the center. After that it disappeared from sight behinds the mountains.
Summary: Light colored cross-shaped with three pulsing orangish lights in a triangle on the underside
